cont.entity_a: Unable to connect to the internet despite multiple replacements.
cont.entity_b: Wireless security causes connectivity issues; open network works better. Connectivity is unreliable.
Technical support is unhelpful and does not provide solutions.

cont.entity_a: Advanced features like VPN and remote access are available but difficult to set up. Frequent crashes and unreliable VPN feature.

cont.entity_b: Sound quality is good when working.

cont.entity_a: G-Only mode does not work; mixed mode works only at 11Mbps unless forced to G mode.
cont.entity_b: Not compatible with Windows Vista or newer operating systems. Device works well with XP but not with newer systems. Product has compatibility issues with certain routers and systems.

cont.entity_a: Firmware updates have been problematic, particularly affecting wireless functionality.
Setup requires IT knowledge; not suitable for beginners.
cont.entity_b: Setup is difficult, especially with Vista, requiring technical support.

cont.entity_a: Support is poor and troubleshooting is time-consuming.
Hardware is generally reliable, but software and support issues persist.
cont.entity_b: Software is outdated and poorly designed, causing operational issues.
Installation instructions are inadequate, causing frustration.
